value: So you have fixed the bridge, huh?
I guess you can be of some use after all.
Now, since that bridge is fixed, you could work out one thing which was buggering me for some time.
You might have noticed our worker options are quite few. This wasn't always so.
Few months ago we also had elves delivered from the east forests.
Wow, elves working in such place? Had no idea they do stuff like that. Not from where we came from at least.
Everyone have to eat, young lady. At more prosper times there were all sorts of workers here.
So why they no longer come here?
No clue. I prefer not to stick my nose into their... lifestyle. Maybe you can figure out.
Speaking of which, the elves might have some clues on our problem.
